problem_data.title: 3Sum With Multiplicity
problem_data.description:
Given an integer array arr, and an integer target, return the number of tuples i, j, k such that i < j < k and arr[i] + arr[j] + arr[k] == target.

As the answer can be very large, return it modulo 10^9 + 7.

examples.explanation: arr[i] = 1, arr[j] = arr[k] = 2 occurs 12 times: We choose one 1 from [1,1] in 2 ways, and two 2s from [2,2,2,2] in 6 ways.
(1, 2, 3) occurred one time in the array so we return 1.

experiment_result.error: AI 未生成任何有效測資
